item.title: Use SSH to logging into Raspberry Pi without Password
item.description: Scenario We can login into remote Raspberry Pi using ssh command: ssh -p PORT USER@IP password: RASPBERRY_PASSWORD As it can be seen, we require to input the Raspberry Pi’s password each time to establish SSH connection. Solution: Add local machine’s SSH key to Raspberry Pi for password less SSH connection To resolve the scenario, we need to add our local machine’s SSH key to the Raspberry Pi.
